name: "Visions of Zosimos : Chaos Omen"
blurb: Dungeons and Dragons meets Magic The Gathering in an online world.

rewards.reward: Three Digital Booster Packs, Unique Visions of Zosimos \u201cBacker\u201d Forum Avatar, Founders Tournament Access, Unique title \u201cNeophyte\u201d, Your name listed in the Kickstarters section of the game credits
$10 Reward Level, plus the following;\r\nOne 60 Card randomly assorted Starter Deck, Unique title \u201cAugur\u201d

$25 Reward Level, plus the following;\r\nAn additional 60 Card Starter Deck, Two additional Digital Booster Packs, One extra Character Slot, Closed Beta Access (Start date expected to be 10/12), Unique title \u201cThaumaturge\u201d

$50 Reward Level, plus the following;\r\nTwo additional 60 Card Starter Decks, Five additional Digital Booster Packs, One additional Character Slots, One extra Homunculus Slot (per character), One extra Deck Slot (per character), Digital Soundtrack, Unique title \u201cSoothsayer\u201d

$100 Reward Level, plus the following;\r\nOne Digital Booster Box, One additional Character Slots, One additional Homunculus Slots (per character), Two additional Deck Slots (per character), Digital Artbook, Unique title \u201cThe Prophet\u201d, Your name listed and highlighted in bronze in the Kickstarters section of the game credits

$250 Reward Level, plus the following;\r\nOne additonal Digital Booster Box, Three Digital Booster Packs For All Future Releases, One additional Character Slots, Two additional Homunculus Slots (per character), Two additional Deck Slots (per character), Unique title \u201cThe Abraxian\u201d, Your name listed and highlighted in silver in the Kickstarters section of the game credits, Access to the Developer section of the Visions of Zosimos Official forums

$500 Reward Level, plus the following;\r\nA 2D portrait painting of you implemented into the game at a later release date, Three Starter Decks for all future Releases, Two additional Character Slots, Two additional Homunculus Slots (per character), Three additional Deck Slots (per character), All future release Character Customization Options Unlocked, Early Alpha and Beta Access to ALL future content, Unique title \u201cof Panopolis\u201d, Your name listed and highlighted in gold in the Kickstarters section of the game credits

$1000 Reward Level, plus the following; \r\nYour name added into the lore of the game, Physical copy of the Visions of Zosimos Art Book, A physical high quality print of your 2D portrait (signed by the artist - Optional), One Digital Booster Box for all future Releases, Two additional Character Slots (per character), Five additional Homunculus Slots (per character), Five additional Deck Slots (per character), Unique title \u201cThe Immortal\u201d, Your name listed and highlighted in ruby in the Kickstarters section of the game credits
